tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I recently had a dental treatment with Dr. Simrata Garg and I couldn't be happier with the results. Dr. Garg was extremely professional and thorough in her assessment and treatment plan. She took the time to explain everything to me and made me feel comfortable throughout the entire process. The treatment itself was quick and painless, and the results exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend Dr. Garg for anyone looking for top-notch dental care. Thank you, Dr. Garg, for your exceptional service!

Apart from my implants I was also guided on the maintenance of my teeth wherein she had conducted innumerable RCTs to improve the general condition of the same. To add feather in the cap, the aesthetic conduction of my teeth improved my smile too. In a nutshell, I am quite thankful for having visited such a wonderful doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was initially visited the clinic as I had tooth sensitivity and when I was told that there would be an orthodontic treatment involved to correct the position of my teeth, I became reluctant. But eventually Dr. Smirata advised me and guided me to go ahead with the treatment so that I can prevent further damage to the teeth, which if once gone can never come back. I understood this as the problem was only becoming worse. I am thankful that finally I am taking the right step. Prevention is better than cure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a lot of pain in my wisdom tooth for 2 weeks and had been delaying the extraction given the COVID situation. When I spoke to Dr Simrata she explained the problem to me over the phone, suggested techniques which I could use at home for immediate relief in the time being and when I scheduled an appointment for extraction last week the doctor ensured appropriate measures for safety including PPE kits, sanitisation of the entire clinic and appropriate masks. I was also provided with post extraction ready reference sheet of dos and donts. Now one week down the line I have completely recovered with no complications. Thank you Dr Simrata.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited her clinic after almost a month of toothache and not so good response from a previous dentist. Not only did Dr. Simrata tell about the underlying issues in detail and the process of the required RCT, it is worthy mentioning that the process was done with due care and without any haste.Further, in current times of the ongoing pandemic, utmost attention has been given to sanitisation and hygiene. Definitely recommendable without a second thought, not only as good medical practitioner but also as a nice person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was in so much pain and my kids were very scared to let me see a doctor at the time when Delhi was badly hit by this second wave. Then I found Dr. Simrata. She understood my problems over phone and started my treatment. She knew I couldn't delay the RCT and also my kids' concern. She took all precautions very well and completed my RCT in single sitting. She is a savior.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr. Simrata for multiple wisdom tooth issues. Friendliness and compassion are the first things that strike when you sit in the dental chair. Her calmness and professionalism during the entire treatment along with thorough explanation of the underlying issue builds a lot of confidence. I highly recommend her for all dental procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had approached Dr.Simrata for my Root Canal Treatment. She was always available with a smile and helping hand.Infact if I had any problem she attended me even on days her clinic was closed.She was available whenever I needed her.Prompt to reply back. A wonderful doctor and a human being.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: First of all I was very scared of getting the RCT done as people around me told that it pains a lot. After the doctor explained how the treatment is going to be done with its pros and cons I was feeling better as it was explained well. Also I did not feel pain at all as the Doctor's hand was very accurate and to top it all she was concerned about one's problem till the time the treatment was fully done. Even after that a call came to check whether all is good or not.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.Simrata treated my extreme calculus deposits and staining, she also explained it to me how my teeth were shortening coz of grinding and Clenching and suggested me to get a mouth guard so as to stop them from deteriorating any further. 
All in all it was a pleasant and virtually painless experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Simrata approach was simply the best.. she is very cordial and kept me updated with each and every step during the treatment.. she is thorough professional at the same time and did an amazing job. I am so glad that i visited her and get my treatment done to my utmost satisfaction..

tags: Value for money,
review: The doctor used all coved precautions for herself and for me.  I had little discoloration of ant two teeth and small cavities. She treated the discoloration  and then filled the cavities without any discomfort or pain. The color of the teeth matched with my adjoining teeth.On my second visit due to the confidence in the doctor  I got .my teeth clean ed and polished

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went in severe pain n was attended immediately. One tooth needed filling n one needed route canal . After x ray my issue was resolved as the filling was done  n first step in RCT was begun . My pain immediately subsided  n subsequent treatment followed. I am so satisfied with the way she relieved me of my excruciating pain n explained everything very patiently n politely

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Garg Dental Care to get my aching broken tooth examined. Got RCT along with bridge done on the same along with another infected tooth in a single sitting. Everything was explained in detail for future dental hygiene for longevity of the teeth as well.Clinic was sanitised after every session putting a rest to any fears that a patient might have during the current situation. Dr Simrata is definitely a recommendable and trustworthy dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review:
I visited dr simrata garg with reference from my friend.
Was really happy with the way she explained me the problem and the procedure to be done.
The environment  was safe even during the pandemic. Sensitization protocol was maintained.
Pain was relieved immediately with the procedure and medication. 
The crown was so much similar to my natiral teeth.
I recommend zirconia crown to all. 
After few days got my wisdom tooth extracted. A painless  procedure although post surgery swelling was there, but was a normal thing.
Thank u dr simrata
